meanings.definition: To give a false impression of
meanings.sent1: Her smile belies her true feelings.
meanings.sent2: The calm exterior belies the storm within.
meanings.sent3: His playful tone belies the seriousness of the situation.
meanings.sent4: The bright colors of the painting belies the artist's dark emotions.
meanings.sent5: The simplicity of her outfit belies her extravagant taste.

meanings.definition: To show to be false or wrong
meanings.sent2: His confident words belies his lack of knowledge.
meanings.sent3: The map belies the true location of the treasure.
meanings.sent4: His actions belies his words of loyalty.
meanings.sent5: The calm demeanor belies the chaos of his thoughts.
